language.description: Administrative interface for widgets on the right sidebar.

specs.title: Right sidebar layout
specs.description:
Active widgets on the right sidebar. One per line using the next syntax:
widget_id | widget_seed_id | title | user_scope | page_scope | pages_list
  • user_scope must be any of all, online and offline.
  • page_scope must be either show or hide.
  • pages_list is a comma-separated list of internal page tags:
    home, post_author_index, post_category_index, post_archive, media_author_index, media_category_index, media_archive, search_results, user_home, user_mentions
